# Able Sniper (Feat)
## Overview
You are accomplished at remaining unseen when youâ€™re sniping with a ranged weapon.

**Prerequisites:** Dex 13, [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] (Hide) 5 ranks.

**Benefit:** You gain a +2 bonus on ranged attack rolls with a weapon made against [[Flat-Footed|flat-footed]] targets that are at least 30 feet away. In addition, you gain a +4 bonus on [[Stealth (Skill)|Stealth]] (Hide) checks made to hide again after you have made an attack roll while hiding.

**Source:** Races of the Wild (WotC), pg. 148
